title: A request
text: Can you add Iraq please would be Useful for me as a student!?

title: Completely broken
text: App is asking me to set a passcode for no phone. It already has a very secure passcode. The app won’t function at all due to this bug. I hope the devs can fix this soon.

title: Bad Service
text: They have the worse customer service that I have seen.

title: Phony cashback offer for creepy information harvesting
text: Do not make the mistake I made. Do not make a purchase through Revolut thinking they will honor their cashback offer - they won’t. Customer service takes forever to connect with, and they are extremely condescending and belittling. Stupidest and creepiest app I ever tried. Predatory, and scammy. They hold onto your private info for 6 years after closing your account. Do not make the same mistake that I did. Do not trust these people.

title: NWO shills
text: Why do you need my photo to send a bank payment? What in the mark of the beast is this nonsense. Take your digital ID nonsense and get lost

title: Tài chính
text: Tốt

title: App is FUBAR
text: US-based iPhone user running on latest versions of iOS and Revolut. The app is barely functional that I no longer feel comfortable using it. 1) App asks for my Social Securitty Number every time it is launched. 2) Debit card verification process doesn't work. 3) Revtag can't be saved after changing even though it is available. 4) Passcode for app-based platform suddenly doesn't work on web-based platform. I wonder if the option to delete my account is still functional...

title: Revolute, the most convenient
text: Revolut has been the mos convenient for me. It won’t charge you for money transfer. Absolutely user friendly. The help center, especially live agents are really efficient and helpful. I am absolutely satisfied.

title: High fees
text:
Adding money cost me $25 …. It’s not a small fee and it’s not a free! 

Only good for European market … US credit cards and apple Pay are charged with high fees just for adding money to your account … Use to be a good app …

title: It is amazing
text: I use every day it so easy and functional. The best bank ever!

title: Great app with no support
text: Great app, but support doesn’t reply or replies very slowly. In case something bad happens - your finances will not be saved quickly, or might be not even saved at time (personal experience)

title: Doesn't support jailbroken devices
text: Meh

title: Horrible Company
text: Will not close account. Keep making excuses.  Cannot get ahold of anyone for support. Do not use!

title: Identity verification system is trash
text: The system fails to verify my identity, and the error messages it give are ridiculously misleading. The customer service is also trash, verbose but never comes up with a valid solution. After wasting hours on the verification, I was told they can’t provide service to me, with no reason. How dare anyone store money in this crappy system?

title: Amazing app
text: Honestly the app and the service itself are both fantastic, and the app is so much better than those of all the legacy banks. It feels more like a tech company than a bank.

title: Terrible app
text: I was on a free trial for a while. Never got notified that even though I cancelled the subscription via apple, that I would still be charged in the Revolut app and now if I downgrade to a standard plan they want to charge me an extra $20 on top of the $10 they already charged me. I didn’t authorize this transaction and I will do everything in my power to stop this from happening to other people and I will not pay this fee. I’ll report it to my credit bureaus and contact lawyers if need be. Very fraudulent scam this company is running to steal your money.

title: Plaid support
text: Hi, I use several banks and I use Copilot app for budgeting and expense tracking. All banks could be connected through the Plaid, but I did not find Revolut in that list, can you please add support for that?

title: Cancel account
text: My account forced me to buy premium, and I wanted to delete my account but now it’s  saying I have to pay a 19$ fee to downgrade my account so I could delete it. They are trying to steal your money.

title: a trap
text: it’s an awful service. the customer support is atrocious and good luck downgrading and closing your account. it is made extremely hard and the whole thing reeks of a class action suit waiting to happen

title: Why so much dam information
text: First where u live then ur SSID then your phone number than ur email then ur zip code like Bru creepy weirdos

title: I take back my rude review
text: Good bank

title: Hello
text: I love it so much thanks

title: ABSOLUTE GARBAGE
text: I’ve been a customer of revolut for two years now and they were good until all they made me wait 7 days to use my money for now reason and when they doubled down and added another 16 days to wait while I had no food or water or ways to get to work so this is just a friendly honest tip just get a regular bank account

title: Account creation from Ghana
text: The app looks good with impressive reviews however when I tried to create an account from Ghana the country could not be found even though I noticed there were other African countries in the list.

title: Will send you to collection for their own fees
text: If you sign up and don’t use it they will try to send you to collections for this own fees even if you never actually use the card. Atrocious business practice. Avoid.

title: Worst banking app
text: Do not install. They take money from you without telling you. Make sure you read the policy thoroughly. Do not do the referral bonuses for some reason they affect your actual credit so everything you get has to be paid back. Plus on the final referral they don’t pay you. I would rather use a bank in a desert or forest before I use this app again

title: I do not recommend
text:
1) No normal client support. Only chat where sometimes I got absolutely wrong information about functionality 
2) When you upgrade your plan to Metal for additional money, you calculate profit, but rules/%/fees for Metal plan can be changed anytime. 
3) if you cannot confirm your documents (for example temporary residence in any country) they limited your account, but did not refund money for Metal plan you bought before. And you get really disappointed situation when you pay maximum money for minimum service. :(
Really shame!
I had actually terrible experience with Revolut and I alway thought that ohh, it’s a new company they need some time for development, but in the last couple of years it became worse and worse. Even application was rewritten in so awful way that it’s became absolutely user unfriendly.
They never became better and never became company which they wanted/stated to be.
It’s pity. :(

title: Last update was terrible
text: Nothing can be found. No logic in new placement at all…

title: Not helpful or easy to use
text: Not very user friendly

title: Idiotic app, impossible to register
text: They give you 15 seconds to input the code that they send you, but the code is sent to your text messages after 30 seconds, freaking stupid

title: My worst experience
text:
I travel a lot and at the beginning I thought the experience was great. But the nightmare came when an airline cancel on me and Revolut team basically showed no empathy or help. I lost a $1,000 and as a single mom that hurt so much. 

I provided this company proof of conversation and still was told I will need to work out this issue with the airline. Although this company seen that after this company cancelled my flight 2 days before leaving Bogota I had to pay for a last minute ticket paying double of what I already paid before. 

Please stay away!!! What is the purpose of paying for fees when you receive mediocre customer service. No one that deal with real time issue and everyone pass the blame on everyone. 

Now this is my last straw with this company and I know I am the fool with this one. But I will be closing this account asap. Recently I order some grocery on a platform. The company took $120 USD from my account. But cancelled and sent me a message that a refund will be issued. I feel like I have PTSD now because Revolut chargeback team is once again showing no sign of support. 

I can’t tell you where to put your money at. But at this moment the most I can do is warn you.

title: The single best online bank. Period
text: Where do I even begin? There’s so many positives with Revolut. Low transfer fees, low to no ATM withdrawal fees worldwide, easily integrates with my Stripe, sending and receiving money is a breeze. But security and support have to be their two best features. Revolut automatically detects and blocks any transactions they didn’t think I made. This has saved me so many headaches on multiple occasions. Whenever I have ANY issues their live chat agent is a click away and they respond instantly and intuitively. And their chargeback policy is amazing. I don’t have to wait 90 days on the merchant. Revolut gives me instant credit. Can’t rave enough about Revolut. What a fantastic product. Oh… and it’s free???!!! Insane.

title: DO NOT TRUST, CAREFUL OF BANK INFORMATION
text: I received money internationally as someone was trying to pay me back money and weren't from the states. I received my money as I put my bank info to do bank to bank transfer like zelle. It said I would receive my funds in one day which I did BUT then someone took money out (scammer) to things I never knew of like remitly which I'm not sure what it is. Be careful. I tried to terminate my account but they make it difficult and said I would have to wait until the 23 to receive my funds pending but I received it.

title: Didn't honor sign up discount
text:
I haven't used the service much but signed up because they offered 3 months free. But when I signed up that was nowhere to be found. When I asked customer service about it they said there was nothing they could do to fix the mistake.

I will still try out the service but the signup experience feels very scammy to me.

title: Could not sign up
text: No explanation why. And absolutely no support. Just trying to sign up in the US but keep getting failure notifications with no explanation why and no ability whatsoever to correct whatever the issue is. Been trying for 3 days. I give up.

title: Very smooth interface easy to use!
text: Love it

title: Misleading
text: When someone told me about what this app is capable of doing I was excited to give it a try. And I told my friends about it also. And when I received my revolut card in the mail. I tried to use the many cool features that other apps don’t have. Nothing the app said would work doesn’t work.  My guess is that the company created this glitchy app and launched too early without testing it out. But was able to get the app going thru clever marketing. That’s my guess. Cuz nothing works on it. U can’t buy crypto. Can’t send crypto or receive. Can’t do the instant transfer from debit card to debit card. I told my friends how this app is going to take over other similar apps but it just made me look stupid. Don’t like to app shame. Maybe in the future the app will start working.  I gave it 2 stars for the good marketing and good concept. I would have given it 5 stars if worked. Long review. I need to get a life.

title: Love it
text: I have been using Revolut for about 2 months. I absolutely love it. Especially the one time use cards for when i buy things online. It’s a great way to bank!!!

title: frozen money
text: I invoiced a customer through a revolut pro  account and the customer paid but then it turned out that the money was frozen for seven days and I didn't expect such crap from this bank. I will delete my account immediately as soon as I transfer the money to another normal bank that does not freeze my finances

title: Like it
text: Easy to use no complaints

title: Pretty rude bank
text: Same crap like all the American systems they get into your blood with selfi , passport Don’t give them anything!!terrbke ans rude applications i don’t recommend to open account with them stay away !

title: Terrible service
text: I have all my legit documents submitted, but the system would just cancel my verification each time. Asking customer service would not help because they just keep pasting answers to you and would not do anything. Wise service is way better!

title: With the new update there is a bug. 1 star is just for you to see
text: The screen which says “This screen is hidden to protect your…” doesn’t disappear and I cannot pass it when trying to send money. Maybe A/B testing hit me, but it is certainly a bug there.

title: Errors all over
text: This app was consistently giving me issues telling me that I couldn’t use my deposit because my card wasn’t verified telling me my Id picture is to blurt when it’s perfectly clear and on top of the telling me my social security number is wrong absolutely outrageous and am so frustrated with this app

title: Can’t verify account
text: Talked with 6-7 ‘live-agents,’ not a single one could explain why Revolut keeps asking me for my SSN and when I input it, it tells me it can’t be verified. I know 1000% it is typed in right. Apparently this is a common issue people have when creating an account and yet there are still no solutions. Fix it, please.

title: Loved it but changed my mind quick
text: Loved the app, made this easier when needing VCC, however this morning I woke up to a $50 charge from a generated VCC that was made while I was asleep! My doors are locked and I sleep alone, this is a major security issue and once resolved I will be closing my account as I don’t feel my money is safe here. After this I’ve decided to move to Step and so far I’ve had no issues, you can use my promo code for a free $1 after sign up. Code MNSBF

title: The app
text:
It is great and all. Everything a crypto investor would have wanted years ago. 

The only reason I know of it is because of sweat coin. I went through the hoops to try to get free sweat coin premium, the app even told me it was still a thing. Come to find out, nope it was just a sneaky scam to try to get me to pay for another account. Absolutely bonkers.

title: DONT MAKE TRANSFER W VALENTINA FLORENTINA
text: Person with user @Isabelle567 on twitter and revolut user @ValentinaFlorentina I is fraudulently stealing money selling concert tickets which they do not have in their possession. The app will not warn you about this criminal so I will. Crime has been reported to state and federal authorities.

title: Holding your money hostage in the name of security
text:
Not even close to the worst banking app in the state. My in-law in Australia asked me to open an account so she can send me the money she owes me. After receiving the money I transferred $1000 to my bank account a few days ago. I was trying to send the rest today and it got declined. As you may have noticed, there is no number you can call to talk to a live agent and live chat takes FOREVER till someone gets back to you with a scripted response and when you ask a question then s/he ghosts you. 
Long story short, after 8 hours they sent me a text saying there is a scam going on and we need you to write some information ( provided by them) on a piece of paper and take a selfie with it (my face in the picture) to verify who i am. It reminds me those hostage movies that they take a photo with the today newspaper to show they are alive. 
Anyhow, it is sad they don’t know the basic of business and customer services. That’s how businesses get screwed and not take off. 
I won’t comply with such a stupid request and already provided all information that tells who I am.

title: Konto eingeschränkt
text: Konto seit Eröffnung eingeschränkt und nicht nutzbar. Sinnlos.
